data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Moon, Seong Yong, Youn, Seok-Hyun, Maran, Balu Alagar Venmathi (2016): A new species of Prohatschekia Nunes-Ruivo, 1954 (Siphonostomatoida: Hatschekiidae) from the scorpaenid fish, Scorpaena neglecta Temminck & Schlegel, 1843 (Scorpaeniformes: Scorpaenidae), in Korean waters. Zootaxa 4174 (1): 153-160, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4174.1.11|2 occurrences
